name: Dr. Pramod Kadam
title: Founder & Chief Surgeon
summary: A leading Laparoscopic & Robotic Surgeon with over 10 years of unparalleled experience. Dr. Kadam is the visionary founder of K-Care Clinic, dedicated to providing top-quality surgical care by blending state-of-the-art technology with a human touch.
